SEARCH
Package RaccoonRush.util

Class ImageLoader

java.lang.Object
RaccoonRush.util.ImageLoader
public class ImageLoader extends Object
This class is responsible for loading all the images used in the game. It loads the images from the resources folder and resizes them to the appropriate size. It also stores the images in EnumMaps and ArrayLists for easy access.

    • resizeImage

      public BufferedImage resizeImage(BufferedImage image, int width, int height)
      This method resizes the image to the specified width and height.
      Parameters:
      image - The image to be resized.
      width - The width of the resized image.
      height - The height of the resized image.
      Returns:
      The resized image.

    • loadImage

      private BufferedImage loadImage(String path)
      This method loads the image from the specified path.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the image to be loaded.
      Returns:
      The loaded and resized image.

    • loadImage

      private BufferedImage loadImage(String path, int width)
      This method loads the image from the specified path and resizes it in the horizontal direction based on the provided width.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the image to be loaded.
      width - The width of the resized image.
      Returns:
      The loaded and resized image.

    • loadImage

      This method loads the image from the specified path and resizes it to the appropriate size.
      Parameters:
      path - The path of the image to be loaded.
      width - The width of the resized image.
      height - The height of the resized image.
      Returns:
      The loaded and resized image.
